fields.title: Pou≈æ√≠vatelia OneUI:
fields.content:
1. Tap and hold down on YouTube or YouTube Vanced app icon
2. Tap on **App info**.
3. Find "**Set as default**" and tap it
4. Tap "**Open supported links**" and choose "**Open in this app**"

In older versions of OneUI, the name of the options in the 4th step might be slightly difference. You may need to tap "**Go to supported URLs**" and choose "**In this app**" option.
In the very older version of OneUI üí©, you may need to go to **Settings** > **Apps** > *[tap three dots at the right corner]* > **Default apps** > **Set as default**. After apps loaded Find YouTube Vanced or YouTube and follow the 4th step...

fields.title: Pou≈æ√≠vatelia MIUI:
fields.content:
1. Open Settings
2. Go to **Apps**,
3. **Manage apps**,
4. Then, tap the three dots at the right corner,
5. **Default apps**,
6. **Opening links**.
7. Wait until all your apps gets listed‚Ä¶
8. Find YouTube or YouTube Vanced and tap it.
9. Tap "**Open supported links**" and choose "**Open**"

fields.title: Pou≈æ√≠vatelia AOSP a ostatn√Ωch UI (OOS, ColorOS, EMUI, atƒè..):
fields.content:
1. Otvorte **Nastavenia**

3. ≈§uknite na **Predvolen√© aplik√°cie**
4. N√°jdite **YouTube** alebo **YouTube Vanced**
9. ≈§uknite na "**Otv√°ra≈• podporovan√© odkazy**" a vyberte mo≈ænos≈• "**Otv√°ra≈• v tejto aplik√°cii**"
